articles.author: By Heather Chen, Andrew Raine, Christian Edwards, Antoinette Radford and Matt Meyer, CNN
articles.title: First US troops killed in Mideast since start of Gaza war: Live updates - CNN
articles.description: Three American service members were killed in a drone attack on a US outpost in Jordan, marking the first time US troops have been killed by enemy fire in the Mideast since the beginning of the Gaza war. Follow for live updates.
articles.content: US President Joe Biden vowed those responsible for the deaths of three US service members in an overnight drone attack on a small US outpost in Jordan will be held accountable, and cast blame on Iran… [+1536 chars]

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Three US service members killed, many wounded in drone attack on US forces in Jordan: Joe Biden | Mint - Mint
articles.description: All the killed US service members were the first US fatalities in months of strikes against American forces across the Middle East by Iranian-backed militias amid the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza.
articles.content: At least three US service members were killed and many were wounded in a drone attack in Jordan by 'Iran-backed' militant groups, news agency AP quoted US President Joe Biden as saying in a statement… [+3207 chars]

articles.author: Luis Castaneda
articles.title: Millions of Americans affected by ‘Long COVID’ - WEAU
articles.description: Millions of Americans continue to be affected by a condition known as Long COVID.
articles.content: EAU CLAIRE, Wis. (MEDILL NEWS SERVICE) - Millions of Americans continue to be affected by a condition known as Long COVID. Some patients with the condition report being ignored by their physicians an… [+2718 chars]
